data.text: @bobkcus Now that they’re being required to track and report those bail outs we might be able to.
@JaieAvila Can you investigate how many committed new offenses while out on bail?

@JaieAvila I believe that our State can save “Taxpayer Money” some other way.  This is a very dangerous practice.  It is my understanding that a lot of these folks have some very serious crimes under their belt, “AND” a lot of them are not showing up for their court appointment date! 😡
